name: Pounce
overview:
Everything is easy with your smartphone and tablet – 1-tap and you can go anywhere – except shopping. Ever tried buying something from your mobile device? Not fun! Not all websites are optimized for mobile viewing, and the checkout is a long, tedious process that sometimes is so frustrating that you simply give up and close your browser in annoyance.

Pounce puts an end to the hassle of mobile shopping. Pounce is a 1-tap ordering app for the mobile world helping you make super easy purchases from well-known retailers and vendors.

No more annoying checkout processes - complete an order by simply tapping an online ad, or scanning a product in print magazine (wherever you see the Pounce™ icon).

Set up Pounce once, and you’re set! No need for endless taps on countless checkout pages. Think of Pounce as your personal check-out spot – just tap or scan the product, and Pounce does all the busy work with the main site – you just tap “Buy Now” – and your purchase is on its way, shipped directly from the retailer!
